heading: Sensual as the night.
subheading: The air conditioner is a design accessory. Discover the unique style of the high-performance Naitec Onyx air conditioner. The elegant dark design becomes a luxurious addition to your interior, while its modern features, including integrated Wi-Fi, ensure maximum comfort and easy control.
why_info_item_1_description: It won't leave you stranded even on the coldest days; this powerful system ensures comfort and warmth in every season. Efficient heating with minimal energy costs.
why_info_item_2_description: UVC light completely eliminates all bacteria and viruses, while the ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. The combination of these innovations in Naitec Onyx air conditioners creates a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_3_description: Wi-Fi control allows you to easily set the temperature, modes, and other functions via your smartphone or tablet from anywhere, anytime.
why_info_item_4_description: With a noise level of only 22 decibels, it is among the quietest air conditioners on the market. You can enjoy undisturbed summer evenings in a pleasant environment at home.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 refrigerant ensures more efficient cooling and heating, significantly reducing environmental impact. It is an ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Onyx automatically cleans its internal evaporator through sterilization to ensure your air is always fresh, free of bacteria and viruses
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the "sterilization" function is activated, the evaporator on the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57°C, which, in combination with the UVC lamp and ionizer, ensures thorough cleaning of the indoor unit and the elimination of pathogenic bacteria. This technology brings a pleasant feeling of freshness to your home and provides a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative impacts.
all_you_need_item_2_title: Heating with air conditioning down to -25°C
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat down to -25°C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We pride ourselves on quality, which is why Naitec Onyx comes with a 3-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only if regular maintenance is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Optional voice controller Lisa for simple and convenient voice control of the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set a performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% energy.
effective_heating_description_1: Naitec air conditioners can heat very efficiently.
effective_heating_description_2: is so powerful that it can easily heat down to -35°C. Efficient heating with minimal energy costs without the need for other heat sources.
